TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content:
Don't know if anyone noticed, but CKAN thread that is pined in Add-on Releases thread is broken. Correct link to thread should be:
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/90246-the-comprehensive-kerbal-archive-network-ckan-package-manager-v1160-13-dec-2015/

But, pined thread have this link:
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/90247-the-comprehensive-kerbal-archive-network-ckan-package-manager-v1143-27-sep-2015/

It is only one number in topic 90246 vs 90247 in link and there is also difference in thread title (version and date).
 

Pinned thread leads to nowhere and therefore is useless.
I think I fixed it, kcs123. How does it look now?

1 hour ago, Vanamonde said:

I think I fixed it, kcs123. How does it look now? 

Faulty thread is no longer pined, but somehow I missed subthread "Tools and Applications", almost reported that proper thread no longer exist

At least noone will click on faulty pined link anymore. Nevertheless, once people find out that CKAN is not in Add-on Releases thread, they will look for it elsewhere.

Wait, it ended up in the wrong sub? Well, I guess I will fix it. Again. 

That's weird. I didn't move it the first time. Just deleted the old link and un-pinned, then re-pinned the thread. Anyway, it should be in the right place now.

Heh, I don't know what should be "proper" forum category, I got this thread subscribed, so it not exactly problem for me. I just noticed broken link and reported it.

Might be that it was on old forum in subthread but with pined redirection in main Add-on Releases, I no longer know for sure what was intended place for this thread.
It was in Tools and Applications since it's not an add-on itself. Probably better in Add-On releases for improved visibility though (I don't think we can make permanent redirects anymore).

Mods, please delete http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/124994-105dec-15-2015-contract-pack-giving-aircraft-a-purpose-gap-03-air-flights-tours-coast-guard-sts/ entirely as I have created a new thread for my contract pack mod in Add-On releases.

Thank you!
Why not ask for it to be moved? That would preserve all posts on it.

Since others have contributed to that thread, their posts are not yours to delete. However, the thread has been closed to additional posting. 

Incidentally, there is a master thread for requests like this, and this thread has been merged into it.
Looks like I messed up my point about Spaceplanes. Lock http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/129687-spaceplanes-need-variety/#comment-2358224 that for me, please?
Got it, SpaceplaneAddict.

Please lock this thread, as I've moved it to Add-On Releases:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/128056-moved-mods-please-lock-thread-community-career-framework-a-balance-mod-standards-cooperative-for-career-games-a-community-recommended-mod-list-that-commits-to-working-well-together-in-career-games/

1 hour ago, inigma said:

Please lock this thread, as I've moved it to Add-On Releases:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/128056-moved-mods-please-lock-thread-community-career-framework-a-balance-mod-standards-cooperative-for-career-games-a-community-recommended-mod-list-that-commits-to-working-well-together-in-career-games/

Locked.

If this hasn't been moved yet:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130321-the-kerbal-space-program-the-tale-of-kerbin/

Needs to be moved to KSP Fan Works rather than Mission Reports. I changed the idea when I realised I could do whatever I wanted on a no pics.
Got it for you, RA3236.
To add-on releases, please.
@Boris-Barboris Moved for you, congrats on your release.
Delete this ASAP: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130731-mods-please-delete/&page=2
Done

I boneheadedly started this redundant thread:  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/131449-sts-107-columbia-rescue-mission/

Thanks!
That thread has been closed. Also, this thread has been merged into the master thread for thread close/move requests.

could I get my thread for Uncharted Lands moved to the Add-On Release forum please?

xoxox

-KillAshley
@KillAshley Moved for you, congrats on your release.
Strategia has been released, and a new thread created in the Add-On Releases section.  Can I get a mod to close the old thread in Add-On Development (here)?
Could you move this to the lounge?
